value.title: Make a Table Visualization to Display All Observations from Data Source in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, I’m demonstrating how we can show all the records even if it is the same as the Power BI table. value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI

Sometimes there is a requirement, where we don’t need the filtering functionality on selected data
